title: मराठा प्रदर्शन का वीडियो असम में NRC के बाद पुलिस का पीछा कर रही उग्र भीड़ का बताया
author: www.altnews.in
vclaim:
Angry Public is chasing away police in assam after NRC

Aurangabad (Maharashtra) police can be seen retreating from Kaigaon Toka bridge on Godavari River, where the agitators got violent on Tuesday, July 24, 2018@TOIIndiaNews@TOIMumbai@TOICitiesNews@PTI_News@ANI@CMOMaharashtra@DGPMaharashtrapic.twitter.com/rA85v5kRXF
